sentence.Network_en: I rang the bell, and directed my servant to pack my portmanteau.
sentence.Network_cn: 我打了铃, 吩咐听差把我的旅行皮包收拾好.

sentence.Network_en: There are some worthless articles of clothing in the old portmanteau.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那口旧皮箱里,放着几件不值钱的衣物.

sentence.Network_en: He always carries this portmanteau with him when he goes abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 出国时他总是带著这个旅行箱.

list.abs: ...多段式电影（anthology film／omnibus film／portmanteau film）是一种由数段短片组成的电影，常常以单一主题、目的或简短的一连串事件（常常是一个转捩点）而互有牵连，有时更会由不同的导演执导每段电影。而中文语境下所称的「电影选集」指的是挑选过的多部电影，意义大为不同。movie-stubCategory:电影类型].

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... portly 健壮的 portmanteau word 紧缩词 portmanteau 旅行皮箱.
... to invent a story,an excuse,etc. 虚构，杜撰，编造（故事、借口等） portmanteau word: 缩合词，合并词 buzz-phrase: 时髦的词组.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French portemanteau, from porter 'carry' + manteau 'mantle'

means.word_mean: 1. a new word formed by joining two others and combining their meanings;

sentences.sentence: "`motel' is a portmanteau word made by combining `motor' and `hotel'"

means.word_mean: 2. a large travelling bag made of stiff leather
